response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this extraordinary opportunity, I kindly propose a price of $15,000. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 15000}
